theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling-Mediated FOXO Longevity Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO as downstream effectors of insulin/IGF signaling, regulated by PI3K/Akt pathway, controlling lifespan via stress resistance and metabolism.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Emphasizes DAF-16/FOXO regulation by insulin/IGF-1 signaling and lifespan extension via oxidative stress resistance and proteostasis.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes FOXO regulation by insulin/IGF signaling and post-translational modifications controlling longevity and stress resistance.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes FOXO regulation by insulin/IGF-1 and stress pathways, post-translational modifications, and conserved longevity functions.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on PI3K-Akt pathway inhibition of FOXO and conserved FOXO target genes mediating aging-related processes.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Details FOXO3 regulation of longevity via insulin/IGF-1 signaling, stem cell maintenance, and chromatin-mediated gene regulation.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes FOXO regulation by insulin/IGF signaling and 14-3-3 proteins antagonizing FOXO, modulating growth, apoptosis, and lifespan.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO1 in metabolic adaptation, DNA repair, tumor suppression, and longevity regulated by insulin/IGF-1 signaling.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes cell-nonautonomous FOXO signaling downstream of insulin/IGF pathways influencing systemic aging and metabolism.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Explores dose- and tissue-dependent FOXO effects on metabolism, proteostasis, and aging, regulated by insulin/IGF-1 signaling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling-Mediated FOXO Longevity Regulation Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Highlights FOXO integration of metabolic and environmental signals via insulin/growth factor pathways to maintain homeostasis and longevity.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Pharmaceutical and Nutraceutical Activation of FOXO3 for Longevity Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO3 as a geroprotective gene activated by pharmaceuticals and nutraceuticals targeting aging pathways.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes FoxO1-SIRT1 positive feedback loop modulated by activators like resveratrol, influencing aging and metabolism.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO as a molecular link between longevity and tumor suppression via cell cycle arrest, apoptosis, and stress resistance.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FoxO3 regulation of neural stem cell homeostasis, quiescence, and prevention of premature differentiation linked to aging.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Details FoxO3-mediated oxidative stress resistance in cardiac aging, promoting antioxidant enzyme expression and protecting heart function.

theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes dysregulated FOXO in cartilage aging and osteoarthritis, linking FOXO activity to tissue homeostasis and inflammation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: FOXO Regulation in Longevity and Tumor Suppression Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on FOXO role in genomic stability, DNA repair, redox balance, and cell fate decisions critical for aging and longevity.
